cityfarmers.visit

Class StealManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cityfarmers.visit.StealManager

  • public class StealManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The StealManager class facilitates the interaction between the database and the VisitCtrl
    Version:
    1.0 08 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Wan Ding Yang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StealManager()
      Creates a VisitCtrl object with a default UDM, PDM, CDM, FDM, SDM and RDM

      • checkAnySteal

      • checkReadyToSteal

        public boolean checkReadyToSteal(User loggedInUser,
                                 Plot plot)
        The checkReadyToSteal method takes a plot and checks if it is ready to harvest.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - the user
        plot - the selected plot
        Returns:
        true if plot ready to steal, false otherwise
